00053 #ifdef _KVI_DEBUG_CHECK_RANGE_
00054         #define __range_valid(_expr) if(!(_expr))debug("[kvirc]: ASSERT FAILED: \"%s\" is false in %s (%d)",#_expr,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00055         #define __range_invalid(_expr) if(_expr)debug("[kvirc]: ASSERT FAILED: \"%s\" is true in %s (%d)",#_expr,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00056 #else
00057         #define __range_valid(_expr)
00058         #define __range_invalid(_expr)
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #if defined(_KVI_DEBUG_) || defined(__KVI_DEBUG__)
00062         #define __ASSERT(_expr) if(!(_expr))debug("[kvirc]: ASSERT FAILED: \"%s\" is false in %s (%d)",#_expr,__FILE__,__LINE__)
00063 #else
00064         #define __ASSERT(_expr)
00065 #endif
00066 
00067 #endif //_KVI_DEBUG_H_
